00020 #include <stream.h>

00026 #include "song.h"
00027 #include "mylist.h"
00028 
00029 // represents a folder on the left
00030 // a folder can
00031 // - contain subfolders
00032 // - have a popup-menu
00033 // - can contain items
00034 class Folder : public QObject, public QListViewItem
00035 {
00036     Q_OBJECT
00037     
00038 public:
00039     Folder( QListView *parent, const QString &name );                       // top-level folder
00040     Folder( QListViewItem *parent, const QString &name );               // subfolder
00041     ~Folder()       {}
00042     virtual void update(MyList* allSongs);
00043 
00044 
00045 //  void insertSubFolders( const QObjectList *lst );
00046     void addSong( Song *s )     { songList.append(s); }                 // adds an item(=Song)
00047     
00048     void clearSongs()                       { songList.clear(); }                       // clear songlist
00049     void removeSong( Song *s )  { songList.removeRef(s); }          // removes an item(=Song)
00050 
00051     QString folderName()                { return fName; }
00052     Song *firstSong()                       { return songList.first(); }
00053     Song *nextSong()                        { return songList.next(); }
00054 
00055     void popup(QPoint point, QPopupMenu* contentMenu);
00056     QPopupMenu* folderPopup;
00057     QPopupMenu* allPopup;
00058     MyList songList;
00059 
00060 public slots:
00061     void enqueueFolder();
00062     void burnFolder();
00063 
00064 signals:
00065     void EnqueueFolder();
00066     void BurnFolder();
00067 
00068 protected:
00069     QString fName;
00070 };
00071 
00072 #endif
